description: This file contains pytest-based unit tests for the ViteTemplate functionality within a project scaffolding tool. It includes fixtures to set up temporary directories and mock configurations, and tests for template initialization, project setup, post-processing scripts, configuration loading, and template variable replacement.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration data class for project parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration for different project types, e.g., VITE.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Data class containing initialization commands and info for templates.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects using templates.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Provides template instances based on template directory.

classes.name: ViteTemplate
classes.description: Template class specific to Vite projects, handles project setup and variable substitution.

methods.name: test_vite_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests retrieving initial info from the ViteTemplate instance.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests successful project directory creation and content placement.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Verifies that post-processing scripts are executed and complete.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks ability to load project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Ensures template variables are correctly replaced with project parameters.
